aspell.command:
cd $SOURCE_DIR
TARBALL=$(ls aspell*.tar.bz2)
DIRECTORY=$(tar tf $TARBALL | cut -d/ -f1 | uniq)

tar xf $TARBALL
cd $DIRECTORY

gnome-shell-extensions.command: mkdir build && cd build && meson -Dextension_set=all --prefix=/usr .. && ninja

grilo.command:
mkdir build &&
cd    build    &&

meson --prefix=/usr \
      --libexecdir=/usr/lib \
-Denable-gtk-doc=false .. &&
ninja

libgdata.command:
mkdir build &&
cd    build    &&

meson --prefix=/usr -Dgtk_doc=false .. &&
ninja
